about.title: About Dimsure
about.subtitle: We're building the world's most comprehensive database of product packaging dimensions, powered by a community of logistics professionals, e-commerce sellers, and shipping enthusiasts.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Every day, millions of packages are shipped around the world. Yet finding accurate packaging dimensions for products remains a frustrating challenge for e-commerce sellers, logistics professionals, and consumers alike.
mission.description2: Dimsure solves this by creating a free, open, community-driven database where anyone can contribute and access verified packaging dimensions. Our goal is simple:

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Sellers
ecommerce.description: Calculate precise shipping costs, optimize packaging, and reduce returns due to size expectations.

logistics.title: Logistics Companies
logistics.description: Optimize warehouse space, plan transport capacity, and improve delivery efficiency.

consumers.title: Consumers
consumers.description: Make informed purchase decisions and plan storage space before buying products online.

step1.title: Community Contributes
step1.description: Users measure and submit packaging dimensions for products they own or handle.

step2.title: Data Gets Verified
step2.description: Multiple submissions and community feedback ensure accuracy and reliability.

step3.title: Everyone Benefits
step3.description: Free access to accurate, collaborative packaging data for all.

community.title: Built by the Community
community.description1: Dimsure is more than just a database‚Äîit's a community of people who believe in the power of shared knowledge. Every measurement, every verification, and every improvement comes from users like you who want to make shipping and logistics more efficient for everyone.
community.description2: Whether you're an Amazon seller looking for FBA dimensions, a logistics manager optimizing warehouse space, or a consumer planning a purchase, your contributions help build something bigger than any individual effort.

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.description: Ready to contribute to the future of packaging data? Join our community today.
